code: import React from'react';import{ListGroup}from'reactstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import CartItem from'./CartItem';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{cartUiActions}from"../../../store/shopping-cart/cartUiSlice";import'../../../styles/shopping-cart.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Cart=function Cart(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var cartProducts=useSelector(function(state){return state.cart.cartItems;});var totalAmount=useSelector(function(state){return state.cart.totalAmount;});var toggleCart=function toggleCart(){dispatch(cartUiActions.toggle());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart__container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListGroup,{className:"cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart__close",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:toggleCart,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-close-circle-fill"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart__item-list",children:cartProducts.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"text-center mt-5",children:"No item added to the cart"}):cartProducts.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItem,{item:item},index);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart__bottom d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h6",{children:["Subtotal amount: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",totalAmount]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/checkout",children:"Checkout"})})]})]})});};export default Cart;
